title: KISSAIR Compact 1500W/750W Space Heater with Thermostat - ETL Certified Ceramic Portable Heater Fan, Ideal for Home/Dorm/Office/Kitchen, Black; indoor, electric, size: 7.72" x 6.38" x 9.13"; weight: 2.6 pounds, three modes: heating 750W, heating 1500W, air circulation; safety: automatically turns off at 45 degrees; delivers heating in 2 seconds, PTC (Positive Temperature Coefficient), noise below 45 dB
descriptions:
Introducing the KISSAIR Compact 1500W/750W Space Heater with Thermostat - the perfect solution for keeping your home, dorm, office, or kitchen cozy and warm. This sleek and portable heater is ETL certified, ensuring top-notch quality and safety.

With its compact size of 7.72" x 6.38" x 9.13" and lightweight design of just 2.6 pounds, this space heater can easily be moved and placed wherever you need it most. Its black color adds a touch of modern elegance to any space.

Featuring three modes - 750W heating, 1500W heating, and air circulation - this space heater offers versatile functionality to suit your specific needs. Whether you need a gentle warmth or a powerful heat boost, this heater has got you covered.

Safety is a top priority with the KISSAIR Compact Space Heater. It automatically turns off when it reaches a 45-degree angle, giving you peace of mind and preventing accidents. The PTC (Positive Temperature Coefficient) heating element delivers quick and efficient heating in just 2 seconds, ensuring you stay warm and comfortable without any delay.

In addition, this heater operates quietly with a noise level below 45 dB, allowing you to work, study, or relax without any disturbance. The intuitive controls and built-in thermostat make it easy to adjust and maintain the perfect temperature.

Don't miss out on the KISSAIR Compact 1500W/750W Space Heater with Thermostat - the ultimate heating solution for any indoor space. Stay warm, stay safe, and enjoy the cozy comfort this heater provides. Get yours today!

Covering an area of up to 200 square feet, this space heater is the perfect addition to your space. Don't miss out on the opportunity to experience warmth and comfort like never before. Get the KISSAIR Compact 1500W/750W Space Heater with Thermostat today and transform your living space into a cozy oasis.
